Game Mechanics

Remixed Pixel Dungeon features various unique mechanics that enhance the gameplay experience.

Core Mechanics

  • Necrotism
  • Dual Wielding
  • Shields
  • Equipment Slots
  • Spells
  • Customizations

UI Mechanics

  • Handedness Option: UI layout can be switched between right-handed and left-handed configurations for better accessibility

Combat Mechanics

  • Class Armor Abilities
  • Special combat interactions
  • Necromancy

Exploration Mechanics

  • Branch Dungeons
  • Town interactions
  • Portal system

See Also

  • Playable Classes
  • Items
  • Enemies
